word_mean: 坏疽：组织的死亡，通常为大块组织，且伴有血液供应(营养)丧失，继以细菌侵入而腐化。参见necrosis和necrobiosis

sentence.Network_en: The wound is festering, and gangrene has set in.
sentence.Network_cn: 伤口在溃烂，已经生了坏疽。

sentence.Network_en: Gangrene set in and he had to have his leg amputated.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的腿生了坏疽，必须截除。

sentence.Network_en: The wound was not properly disinfected and gangrene set in.
sentence.Network_cn: 伤口未进行适当的消毒,开始生坏疽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 对坏疽(gangrene)、静脉溃疡(venous ulcers)、胃溃疡(peptic ulcers)及糖尿病溃疡(diabetic ulcers)的伤口愈合有效，可使病人免于手术.
其他症状包括肢体苍白，紫绀，冰冷，溃疡及坏死（gangrene）。此时因双腿营养不足，常有腿毛稀疏，小腿肌肉萎缩等现象出现。
... (limbs) 痉挛(四肢) (gangrene) 糖尿病足(坏疽) (DUB) 功能异常性子宫出血.
学名为坏疽或脱疽(gangrene)或俗称“乌干蛇”的血管疾病，大部份是属于血管疾病中因末梢动脉血管硬化所造成的并非传染所致，有时 …

list.abs: hospital 医院hospital gangrene 医院坏疽-
医学及制药专业词汇 -... ... diabetic diet 糖尿病饮食 diabetic gangrene 糖尿病性坏疽 diabetic retinitis 糖尿病性视网膜炎.
...使坏死组织呈黑色,坏疽分为以下三种类型, 干性坏疽,dry gangrene,大多见于四肢末端,例如动脉粥样硬化,血栓闭塞性脉管炎和冻伤等疾患时,此.
paradox 奇论paradoxe gangrene 奇异坏疽paradoxia 奇论

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via French from Latin gangraena, from Greek gangraina

entry.def: Gangrene is the decay that can occur in a part of a person's body if the blood stops flowing to it, for example as a result of illness or injury.

example.ex: Once gangrene has developed the tissue is dead.
example.tran: 一旦出现坏疽，机体组织便已死亡。

means.word_mean: 1. necrotic tissue; a mortified or gangrenous part or mass
2. the localized death of living cells (as from infection or the interruption of blood supply)

auth_sentence.content: This death of the tissue is called gangrene.
auth_sentence.res_content: This death of the tissue is called gangrene.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This death of the tissue is called gangrene.

auth_sentence.content: Wet gangrene is caused by toxin-producing bacteria that destroy body tissue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wet gangrene is caused by toxin-producing bacteria that destroy body tissue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wet gangrene is caused by toxin-producing bacteria that destroy body tissue.

auth_sentence.content: Reduction of the blood supply to body tissue causes dry gangrene.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reduction of the blood supply to body tissue causes dry gangrene.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reduction of the blood supply to body tissue causes dry gangrene.

sentences.en: The wound was not properly disinfected and gangrene set in.
sentences.cn: 伤口未进行适当的消毒，开始生坏疽。
